commenter_a: It's not super lice it's called...ignorance. Schools inform by sending a note that lice has been found in the classroom. The person is not identified at all..not even to the parent. Infested child goes untreated. Why? The same reason some are abused and some are not, the same reason some parents care about their children and others don't. Children are going untreated and/or not treated properly. This has been going on for years.
